issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi,
as I know, I can't use multiple columns for an idAttribute
this is useful for middel table on ManyToMany tables like below:

User Table:
 - id ( Integer )
 - username ( Text )

Group Table:
 - id ( Integer )
 - name ( Text )

Middle Table:
 user_id ( Integer ) 
 group_id ( Integer )

I want to use middle table for fetching user 1
I use idAttribute: "user_id, group_id" but it's not working

comments.body: As most of the back-end storage methods don't support multiple primary keys, it doesn't make sense to implement in the core of Alloy. If a particular sync adapter implementation wants to, they can, but not in the core of alloy's code.
